Britain's nuclear deterrent missile system misfires during test - The SunBritain's Trident nuclear missile system misfired during a test last month when a missile crashed into the ocean near the submarine that launched it, The Sun newspaper reported on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 07:15:36 GMT TZJP4KK77NMH7B7GMIZLEYWBBM https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britains-nuclear-deterrent-missile-system-misfires-during-test-sun-2024-02-21/Reuters世界英国
Nukes in space: What have Russia and the United States said?Unidentified sources in the United States say Russia is developing a space-based anti-satellite nuclear weapon but President Vladimir Putin said he opposes nuclear weapons in space and Moscow has flatly denied the U.S. assertions. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 07:10:28 GMT 33TKBBVIT5NMTAJFTACEHXJ7TM https://www.reuters.com/world/nukes-space-what-have- Russia-united-states-said-2024-02-21/Guy Faulconbridge, Arshad Mohammed世界
Ukraine outnumbered, outgunned, ground down by relentless RussiaAs the Ukraine war enters its third year, the infantry of 59th Brigade are confronting a bleak reality: they're running out of soldiers and ammunition to resist their Russian invaders. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 07:08:53 GMT 6Y6ZRKJP6BO2HE5IUTXVMOT3RQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-outnumbered-outgunned-ground-down-by-relentless-Russia-2024-02-21/Max Hunder世界欧洲
Thai influential ex-PM Thaksin gets visit from old ally Hun Sen of CambodiaThailand's influential ex-premier Thaksin Shinawatra, who was released this week from detention, was visited on Wednesday by former Cambodian leader Hun Sen, one of the tycoon's closest allies during his 15 years of self-imposed exile. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 07:01:18 GMT G5J4FJBMFNPG5FZZL4CCOS2H2A https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thai-influenceial-ex-pm-thaksin-gets-visit-old-ally-hun-sen-cambodia-2024-02-21/Panu Wongcha-Um, Panarat Thepgumpanat世界亚太地区
China's childcare costs among highest in world, think tank saysChina is one of the world's most expensive places to raise a child, relative to its GDP per capita, a prominent Chinese think tank said on Wednesday as it detailed the time and opportunity costs for women who opt to have children in the country. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:58:42 GMT WQJBUYNEZRJCNNIXEGKVFAERSM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-childcare-costs-among-highest-world-think-tank-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中国
Australia loses out as Chinese tourists flock to Southeast AsiaAs Chinese tourism booms to visa-free countries in Southeast Asia, Australia is losing out, with more cost-conscious mainland travellers also choosing cheaper destinations closer to home, according to tour operators and industry data. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:13:54 GMT RGKC3IAQPJJHLDF5IBYDEQZGGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-loses-out-chinese-tourists-flock-southeast-asia-2024-02-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
As Rafah braces for Israeli ground assault, Biden says 'ceasefire' more oftenU.S. President Joe Biden spent months wanting a "pause" in the fighting between Israel and Hamas in Gaza. But with Israel preparing for a ground offensive in Rafah, his rhetoric is shifting to emphasize the need for a "temporary ceasefire". Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:04:13 GMT VKVA3SVZL5PARFTMFZIJX2E3RY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/rafah-braces-israeli-ground-assault-biden-says-ceasefire-more-often-2024-02-21/ Steve Holland, Michelle Nichols, Humeyra Pamuk, David Brunnstrom世界中东
Belarus leader Lukashenko calls for armed street patrols, warns of 'extremist' crimeBelarus President Alexander Lukashenko called on law enforcement agencies on Tuesday to organise patrols with small arms on the streets of Belarusian cities to ensure the safety of people. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 05:50:56 GMT UINXJUXS2VJVJJCPXYAMKD5VQA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belarus-leader-lukashenko-calls-armed-street-patrols-warns-extremist-crime-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
More South Korea doctors join protest, authorities warn patients at riskThousands of trainee doctors at South Korea's biggest hospitals joined a walkout on Wednesday to protest a plan to admit more students to medical school, disrupting treatment for scores of patients, health authorities said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 04:47:44 GMT 3EHTQQF3NVP7DJHIJ2DGPTMR2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/more-south-korea-doctors-join-protest-authorities-warn-病人-risk-2024-02-21/Ju-Min Park商业工作世界
Chinese capital closes highways after heavy snowfallAuthorities in Beijing shut some highways on Wednesday after heavier-than-expected snowfall hit the Chinese capital, part of a cold spell sweeping many parts of the country this week. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 04:38:35 GMT OMCIYA7H4JID5JMXTBKHF74PIA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/beijing-shuts-highways-after-heavy-snowfall-2024-02-21/Liz Lee, Alessandro Diviggiano商业环境
Police fire tear gas at Indian farmers marching on capitalIndian police fired tear gas on Wednesday to scatter protesting farmers as they resumed a march to the capital, equipped with cranes and excavators after talks with the government on guaranteed prices for their produce failed to break a deadlock. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 04:17:57 GMT 4QFCARZCAFJJTBF6QJVASYUWJU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/with-cranes-excavators-indian-farmers-prepare-march-capital-2024-02-21/Sunil Kataria世界印度
